title: Phenomenal launches full text-to-video AI platform
description: The platform is poised to transform the landscape of video content creation, the company said in a statement.Phenomenal launches full text-to-video AI platform
content: Phenomenal AI on Monday said it has launched India's first full text-to-video (TTV) Artificial Intelligence platform. The platform is poised to transform the landscape of video content creation, the company said in a statement. Leveraging advanced AI and Machine Learning technologies, Phenomenal AI empowers users to generate high-quality videos from mere text descriptions, making professional video production accessible to all, it said. With its technology, users can create engaging videos for marketing, education, e-commerce, social media, and personal projects, making video creation as simple as writing a script, in this case, a prompt, it added.
